intent_atoms.description: Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow
ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests must pass on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support
Testing cannot be performed in container due to missing macOS UI testing entitlements
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness
Combine-backed UI benchmark must run on macOS runner with Xcode/Combine and produce latency metrics
Benchmark cannot be executed in container because Combine is unavailable on Linux
Surface session persistence errors once diagnostics plumbing is available
Session persistence errors must be surfaced when diagnostics plumbing is enabled
Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities according to defined reconciliation rules
CoreData bookmarks and live bookmarks must match after reconciliation
Reconciliation rules are not yet defined
Evaluate automation via Apple Events for notarized builds and extend entitlements safely
Automation via Apple Events must be evaluated and applied to a well‑tuned entitlements configuration
This task completed in earlier work
Finalize release checklist and go-live runbook covering QA sign-off, completion …
